title: French Crown Jungle Perfume
story_description:
Story To be an exotic man of the jungle. A Citrus - woody-spicy Fragrance, a potent take on
freshness, fizzes, and bursts with stylish wooden packaging that exudes a royal vibe. Feels like an
escape to the very heart of nature and quickly turns into a smooth wave of seduction. Leave behind
the stressful city rush and focus on what really matters.
description:
To be an exotic man of the jungle. A Citrus - woody-spicy Fragrance, a potent take on freshness,
fizzes, and bursts with stylish wooden packaging that exudes a royal vibe. Feels like an escape to
the very heart of nature and quickly turns into a smooth wave of seduction. Leave behind the
stressful city rush and focus on what really matters.Designed to enhance a man’s natural scent, this perfume gives out a classy and powerful aroma.
It typically contains a mix of essential oils and other aromatic compounds, with each scent unique
to an individual’s personality.
Apply your selected scent to pulse points and exposed sections of skin, such as the neck or wrists,
for a lasting effect throughout the day.

title: French Crown stogy Perfume
story_description:
Story Energetic and Refreshing. Explore your villainous streak with all-new cigar perfume for men
by French Crown. This new fragrance, with woody notes, keeps body odour at bay and lasts forever.
Spray it on your shoulder and cuffs and unravel your lethal personality like a true-blue villain.
The finesse of the wooden packaging gives a royal look to the product.

luxurious and elegant fragrance for the heroic personality. This classic hookah fragrance and royal
wooden packaging can bring back anyone to its roots.Designed to enhance a man’s natural scent, this perfume gives out a classy and powerful aroma.
It typically contains a mix of essential oils and other aromatic compounds, with each scent unique
to an individual’s personality.
Apply your selected scent to pulse points and exposed sections of skin, such as the neck or wrists,
for a lasting effect throughout the day.

title: French Crown sheesha and Cool Water Perfume Combo
story_description:
Story Pour yourself a brilliantly boozy concoction with this hookah and cool water perfume combo
from French Crown. Their intense and unique aroma for sure raises your bar. The utterly masculine
fragrance is long-lasting and strong that lets you be outlandish with ultimate sophistication.
